title.rendered: UK Space Design Competition Digital Finals 2021

content.rendered:
The UKSDC digital finals will take place between the 19th-21st March 2021.

On Friday 19th March, between 7:30 – 9pm you will be able to check out your link for the competition, introduce yourself to the rest of your company, and meet your CEO’s.

The Press Release and Programme Booklet will be sent to your team supervisor by Wednesday 17th March.

Any information given out on the Friday will be made available to finalists unable to attend the session – please let me know.

j.lyons@uksdc.org
